title: Short-Term Activity-Based Blended Learning Course for Enhancing Game Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Game Theory and Digital Tool Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized learning activity design for PC-unavailable environments, providing continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the game design process step-by-step and explain its core elements (systems, aesthetics, interactivity).
Learners can design team-based prototypes and provide feedback using mobile collaboration tools.
Learners can write reflective journals and establish improvement plans through an online feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
